name: rs_utils

rs_utils\/process_list.description: Adds extra processes for RightScale to monitor.

rs_utils\/private_ssh_key.description: Private SSH key to install on instance.

rs_utils\/timezone.description: Sets the server timezone. The Default value is UTC. The server will not be updated for daylight savings time.
